articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Does Recent Cost Restructuring Make UPS Attractive at Current 2025 Price Levels?. If you are wondering whether United Parcel Service is a bargain or a trap at current levels, especially with all the noise around e commerce and logistics, you are not alone. This article focuses on what the numbers indicate about value. Despite being down 18.7% year to date and 14.4% over the last year, UPS has quietly risen about 0.7% in the last week and 6.4% over the past month.
